```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Problem 1

```{r create}
set.seed(1)
vct_rand <- runif(10, 0, 5)
vct_logi <- vct_rand > 2
vct_char <- character(length = 10)
vct_fact <- factor(x = character(length = 10), levels = 10)

df_diff_types <- data.frame(
	"random_vector" = vct_rand,
	"logic_vector" = vct_logi,
	"character_vector" = vct_char,
	"factor_vector" = vct_fact
)

lapply(df_diff_types, FUN = mean)
```
